article.title: E-learning 中的个性化技术研究
article.author: Hao Xingwei
article.address: (Shangdong University, School of Computer Science and Technology, Jinan, 250100)

abstract.content: E-learning is now becoming a very important means in modern education, but the existing E-learning systems are short of pernonalization, the model of teaching is so simple that the procedures of learning are almost the same. How to build a pernonalization learning circumstance,...

keywords.content: E-learning, Acknowledge, Point, Pernonalized service, Web discovery

abstract.content: E-learning 是指基于网络的、电子化、数字化、多媒体的教学方式。在实际应用中，E-learning 的范畴非常广泛，它不仅包含基于互联网的网络化学习，还包括了基于多媒体 资料的数字化学习。随着Internet 的快速发展和普及，以及教育的全球化和由此带来的教育竞争的加剧，基于Web的E-learning 系统已经成为许多大学和教育机构实施现代化远 程教育的重要手段。
